snippet: Mayors of several cities decided to ban the shows of Dieudonné M’bala M’bala, who is accused of insulting the memory of Holocaust victims and threatening public order with anti-Semitic gibes.
abstract: Mayors of several French cities decide to ban performances of comedian Dieudonne M’Bala M'Bala, who is accused of of insulting the memory of Holocaust victims and threatening public order with anti-Semitic gibes.
lead_paragraph: Mayors of several cities decided to ban the shows of Dieudonné M’bala M’bala, who is accused of insulting the memory of Holocaust victims and threatening public order with anti-Semitic gibes.
